mapper.select: SELECT c.equ_code, c.proc_id, c.equ_name, c.equ_stat, c.equ_line, i.equ_suit, i.check_date, i.check_next, c.equ_check, i.check_info, i.check_info, o.oper_start, o.oper_fnish, c.equ_img FROM equ_con c LEFT OUTER JOIN equ_insp i ON c.equ_code = i.equ_code LEFT OUTER JOIN equ_oper o ON c.equ_code = o.equ_code

SELECT c.equ_code, c.proc_id, c.equ_name, c.equ_stat, c.equ_line, i.equ_suit, i.check_date, i.check_next, c.equ_check, i.check_info, i.check_info, o.oper_start, o.oper_fnish, c.equ_img FROM EQU_CON c LEFT OUTER JOIN EQU_INSP i ON c.equ_code = i.equ_code LEFT OUTER JOIN EQU_OPER o ON c.equ_code = o.equ_code WHERE ( c.equ_code = #{equCode} OR #{equCode} IS NULL) AND (c.equ_name = #{equName} OR #{equName} IS NULL)
SELECT equ_code, proc_id, equ_name, equ_model, equ_stat, equ_line, equ_check, equ_img, emp_id FROM equ_con ORDER BY equ_code
mapper.insert: insert into equ_con (equ_code, proc_id, equ_name, equ_model, equ_stat, equ_line, equ_img, emp_id, equ_check) values(#{equCode}, #{procId}, #{equName}, #{equModel}, #{equStat}, #{equLine}, #{equImg}, #{empId}, #{equCheck})
